step_feedback.feedback: Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your wrists and elbows more still during this movement.
Good job on the shoulder movement! Continue to minimize wrist and elbow motion to isolate the shoulder roll.
Excellent! You're completing the repetitions well. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply with each movement to help with lymphatic flow.
